title: Debunking the AI Hype: Inside Real Hacker Tactics
description: Is AI really reshaping the cyber threat landscape, or is the constant drumbeat of hype drowning out actual, more tangible, real-world dangers? According to Picus Labsâ€™ Red Report 2025 which analyzed over one million malware samples, there's been no significant surge, so far, in AI-driven attacks.
